title: Privacy Parrot
description: A tool that uses machine learning and statistical analysis to determine if a site's privacy policy allows them to share your personal information.

cards.title: Landing Page
cards.description: The focus of the site is to search for information about other sites, so the landing page makes that clear and explainins what the site is for. Every section can be found clearly and unobtrusively.

cards.title: Popular Policies
cards.description: The list of most frequently visited policy pages. Search results also also use this format, except when there is only one result. Search and navigation are now at the top of the site with a diminished focus, but are still easy to find.

cards.title: Policy Page
cards.description: Displays the classification information for the requested site. The classification is most prominent. Links to the site, its privacy policy, and a correction form are easily available.
